answers.answer: I had them with my son because I kept going into premature labor. You need those and so do baby. Everything will be ok:)

I haven't went into preterm labor no contractions. I went into the doctor for my weekly check up. Blood pressure was 135/84 then was 113/82 I had to get the shot and do more blood work and also Pee in a jug for the next 24 hours. I'm just wondering what's going on. Does the doctor think my baby will be born soon
Maybe your doctor is thinking he might need to induce you early?

If your blood pressure is high they might have to deliver the baby early. That's why they gave you the steroid shots. I was going into premature labor and had both rounds of steroids and they put me on magnesium for 24 hours to stop my labor. Also had to pee in a bed pan. The steroids help the lungs mature faster and the magnesium prevents cerebral palsy or bleeding in the baby's brain.

I will find out Wednesday at my next appointment. Before all of this she scheduled me to be induced at 38 weeks 3 day. But now this so I hope not any sooner but whatever is best for my baby. I'm scared and worried. I'm a ftm so all this is new to me.
I had them at 33 weeks and i had 2 of them... before they deliver you they have to check for protein
So by Mr having to get them I will most likely have him early?

I didnt my dr did it as a precaution in case he was coming earlier, but if you have preeclampsia they check for protein and try to hold you off most they can.. atleast my Dr did... my bloodpressure was pretty bad and all but my dr was great and i was able to have him full term by c sec
They are just given as a precaution just in case the baby comes early.
I had the shots with my last baby due to preterm labor. They made it hard to sleep at night. Doc said insomnia was a possible side effect.

Sounds like theyare chexking for preeclamisa. If you would to have it depending on how bad your baby will be born early. Steriods just help with their lungs and so on just case. My neice was born at 37 weeks due to this. She was fine. Google it and read up on it to help ease your mind
Yes that a what they are testing me for. Minds at ease now. Thank you. my family helped me out. I'll know more Wednesday at my next appointment.

question: Has anyone else had this at 33 weeks. I got the first round today and I need to know what to expect. I'm kinda scared right now.
title: steroid injections
